verses.verse: But him that is weak<WG770> in faith<WG4102> receive<WG4355> ye<WG3361>, yet not for<WG1519> decision<WG1253> of scruples<WG1261>.
<WG3303> One<WG3739> man hath faith<WG4100> to eat<WG5315> all things<WG3956>: but<WG1161> he that is weak<WG770> eateth<WG2068> herbs<WG3001>.

Let <WG1848> not<WG3361> him that eateth<WG2068> set at nought<WG1848> him that eateth<WG2068> not<WG3361>; and<WG2532> let<WG2919> not<WG3361> him that eateth<WG2068> not<WG3361> judge<WG2919> him that eateth<WG2068>: for<WG1063> God<WG2316> hath received<WG4355> him<WG846>.

Who <WG5101> art<WG1488> thou<WG4771> that judgest<WG2919> the servant<WG3610> of another<WG245>? to his own<WG2398> lord<WG2962> he standeth<WG4739> or<WG2228> falleth<WG4098>. Yea<WG1161>, he shall be made<WG2476> to stand<WG1063>; for the Lord<WG2316> hath<WG2076> power<WG1415> to make<WG2476> him<WG846> stand<WG2476>.

One man<WG3739> esteemeth<WG2919> one day<WG2250> above<WG3844> another<WG1161>: another<WG3739> esteemeth<WG2919> every<WG3956> day<WG2250> alike<WG4135>. Let each man<WG1538> be fully assured<WG4135> in<WG1722> his own<WG2398> mind<WG3563>.

He that regardeth<WG5426> the day<WG2250>, regardeth<WG5426> it unto the Lord<WG2962>: and<WG2532> he that eateth<WG2068>, eateth<WG2068> unto the Lord<WG2962>, for<WG1063> he giveth<WG2168> God<WG2316> thanks<WG2168>; and<WG2532> he that eateth<WG2068> not<WG3756>, unto the Lord<WG2962> he eateth<WG2068> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> giveth<WG2168> God<WG2316> thanks<WG2168>.
For <WG1063> none<WG3762> of us<WG2257> liveth<WG2198> to himself<WG1438>, and<WG2532> none<WG3762> dieth<WG599> to himself<WG1438>.

For <WG1063> whether1437, Deuteronomy37 we live<WG2198>, we live<WG2198> unto the Lord<WG2962>; or<WG5037> whether<WG1437> we die<WG599>, we die<WG599> unto the Lord<WG2962>: whether1437, Deuteronomy37 we live<WG2198> therefore<WG3767>, or1437, Deuteronomy37 die<WG599>, we are<WG2070> the Lord<WG2962>'s.

For <WG1063> to<WG1519> this end<WG5124> Christ5547, 2532 died<WG599> and2532, Zechariah, 2532 lived<WG326> again<WG2443>, that he might be Lord<WG2961> of both<WG2532> the dead<WG3498> and<WG2532> the living<WG2198>.

But <WG1161> thou<WG5101>, why dost<WG2919> thou<WG4771> judge<WG2919> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80>? or2228, 2532 thou again<WG5101>, why dost<WG1848> thou<WG4771> set at nought<WG1848> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80>? for<WG1063> we shall<WG3936> all<WG3956> stand<WG3936> before the judgment-seat<WG968> of God<WG5547>.

For <WG1063> it is written<WG1125>, As I<WG1473> live<WG2198>, saith<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962>, to me<WG1698> every<WG3956> knee<WG1119> shall bow<WG2578>, And<WG2532> every<WG3956> tongue<WG1100> shall confess<WG1843> to God<WG2316>.
So <WG686> then<WG3767> each one<WG1538> of us<WG2257> shall give<WG1325> account<WG3056> of<WG4012> himself<WG1438> to God<WG2316>.

Let us<WG2919> not<WG3371> therefore<WG3767> judge<WG2919> one another<WG240> any more<WG3371>: but<WG235> judge<WG2919> ye this<WG5124> rather<WG3123>, that<WG3588> no man<WG3361> put<WG5087> a stumblingblock<WG4348> in<WG80> his brother<WG80>'s way, or<WG2228> an occasion of falling<WG4625>.

I know<WG1492>, and<WG2532> am persuaded<WG3982> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>, that<WG3754> nothing<WG3762> is unclean<WG2839> of<WG1223> itself<WG1487>: save<WG3361> that to him who accounteth<WG3049> anything<WG5100> to be<WG1511> unclean<WG2839>, to him<WG1565> it is unclean<WG2839>.

For <WG1161> if<WG1487> because<WG1223> of meat<WG1033> thy<WG4675> brother<WG80> is grieved<WG3076>, <WG3765> thou<WG4043> walkest no<WG3765> longer<WG2596> in love<WG26>. Destroy<WG622> not<WG3361> with<WG1033> thy<WG4675> meat<WG1033> him<WG1565> for<WG5228> whom<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599>.
Let <WG987> not<WG3361> then<WG3767> your<WG5216> good<WG18> be evil spoken of<WG987>:

for <WG1063> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> eating<WG1035> and<WG2532> drinking<WG4213>, but<WG235> righteousness<WG1343> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> and<WG2532> joy<WG5479> in<WG1722> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>.
For <WG1063> he that<WG1398> herein1722, 5125 serveth<WG1398> Christ<WG5547> is well-pleasing<WG2101> to God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> approved<WG1384> of men<WG444>.
So then<WG3767> let us<WG1377> follow after<WG1377> things<WG3588> which make for peace<WG1515>, and<WG2532> things<WG3588> whereby<WG1519> we may edify<WG3619> one another<WG240>.

Overthrow <WG2647> not<WG3361> for<WG1752> meat<WG1033>'s sake the work<WG2041> of God<WG2316>. All things<WG3956> indeed<WG3303> are clean<WG2513>; howbeit<WG235> it is evil<WG2556> for that man<WG444> who eateth<WG2068> with<WG1223> offence<WG4348>.
It is good<WG2570> not<WG3361> to eat<WG5315> flesh<WG2907>, nor<WG3366> to drink<WG4095> wine<WG3631>, nor<WG3366> to do anything whereby1722, 3739 thy<WG4675> brother<WG80> stumbleth<WG4350>.

The faith<WG4102> which thou<WG4771> hast<WG2192>, have<WG2192> thou to<WG2596> thyself<WG4572> before<WG1799> God<WG2316>. Happy<WG3107> is he that judgeth<WG2919> not<WG3361> himself<WG1438> in<WG1722> that which<WG3739> he approveth<WG1381>.

But <WG1161> he that doubteth<WG1252> is condemned<WG2632> if<WG1437> he eat<WG5315>, because<WG3754> he eateth not<WG3756> of<WG1537> faith<WG4102>; and whatsoever<WG3956> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> faith<WG4102> is<WG2076> sin<WG266>.
